name: Runaway (HackTrout)
description:
Keep the fire in your stolen steam engine alive while fighting off the police!

Controls:

  • Use WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Use the Mouse to Shoot

Programs Used:

  • GraphicsGale
  • Godot
  • Audacity

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Made for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam, rate it here, https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/runaway
